section_title: Use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2010
section_text: 1 The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31 March 2010 is authorised to the amount of £6,617,232,000.

section_title: Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31 March 2010
section_text: 2 The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom and apply to the service of the year ending with 31 March 2010 the sum of £23,998,577,000.

section_title: Use of resources for the year ending with 31 March 2011
section_text: 3 The use of resources for the service of the year ending with 31 March 2011 is authorised to the amount of £218,175,405,000.

section_title: Issue out of the Consolidated Fund for the year ending with 31 March 2011
section_text: 4 The Treasury may issue out of the Consolidated Fund of the United Kingdom and apply to the service of the year ending with 31 March 2011 the sum of £219,011,739,000.
5 This Act may be cited as the Consolidated Fund Act 2009.
